module.name: PIN Sets
module.description: Allow creation of lists of PINs (numbers for passwords) that can be used by other modules (eg, trunks).
module.changelog: *1.2* Add SQLite3 support, fixes http://freepbx.org/trac/ticket/1778 *1.1* Add he_IL translation, add naftali5's fixes where pinsets were being lost when moved around. *1.0.11* Stop potential error where a random pinset is appearing when creating a new trunk
